participant_1.background:
I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university.
I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.
my last name is spanish , but i tell people that its italian.
I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up.
I am still haunted by the events of that day, but I am trying to move on with my life.

participant_2.background:
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.
my suspenders sometimes make my shoulders hurt.
i like my job.
My morning routine starts with taking my allergy medication so that I can tolerate being around my neighbors' cats.
I started spending more time with my family and focusing on my own hobbies.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just got back from a trip to Japan.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Japan.
It was incredible! I spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.
That sounds like so much fun! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thank you! It was an amazing experience.
I'm sure it was. What was your favorite thing about Japan?
There's so much to choose from, but I think my favorite thing was the food.
The food is amazing, right? I've heard that they have some of the best sushi in the world.
It's true! I had some of the best sushi of my life in Japan.
I'm so jealous! I can't wait to go one day.
You definitely should! It's an amazing place to visit.
